Please fill out the information below to request a commercial license. Provide as much detail as possible to speed up processing.

- Company / Entity Name:
- Contact Person (name & email):
- Intended Product / Project Name:
- Distribution Model (SaaS, embedded, redistributed binaries, internal use only, etc.):
- Will you redistribute modified or unmodified binaries? (Yes/No) If yes, how?
- Estimated Monthly Active Users or Number of Deployments:
- License Duration Requested (perpetual / 1 year / 3 years / other):
- Additional Requirements (source access, indemnity, priority support, SLA):
- Preferred Payment or Billing Info (optional):

After submission we will respond within 5 business days with a proposed commercial license offer.
